Text: Project Blackwater Cc We just delivered signed documents to EES on Project Blackwater and the deal has effectively closed Thank you very much for all of your hard work over the last couple of weeks and particluarly over the last couple of days This was a tough deal with a lot of moving parts and your participation in getting the first longterm power deal done with EES for Enron Compression Services Company is greatly appreciated We look forward to working on additional deals with more innovative structures going forward into Sincerely Chris Hilgert

RE Chile dealpst Louise It is my understanding that we will be buying the gas in Argentina from either the northern or eastern end of ENAPs production system in the Magallenes Region of Chile down near the Tiera del Fuego I know that there is an interconnect point to purchase gas off TGS at the northern end of ENAPs system Nonetheless you will find attached the presentation that the South American office put together for our visit with ENAPs management regarding Enrons presence in South America and the terms conditions for a notional gas marketing agreement the last three slides This was set up for delivery into TGS as outlined I have a call into Federico as well and will provide any further clarification if necessary Dont hesitate to call with any other questions We should have the revised letter agreement with ENAP signed up within the next week Thanks Chris Original Message From Kitchen Louise Sent Thu PM To Chris NRON Cc Subject Chile deal Where exactly are we buying the gas Argentinia or Chile And can you please forward a profile

ECS Ski Trip Informationpst Louise Per our discussion you will find attached an itemized accounting from expense reports for the customer ski trip that Andrew Miles and John Kiani from my group attended in Vail with two customers of Iroquois Pipeline who we have been working with to try and do a deal on their Eastchester Phase II Expansion As for the link on the wwwskihomerentalcom website I am at a loss I have put a phone call into these people for an explanation and have asked for this link to be removed I can only assume that this was set up when we were talking to the internal client entertainment group about using the Enron Beaver Creek houses as the house descriptions look familiar We declined to use their services as a trip of this magnitude would have cost closer to at least for four people and we decided to scope one out independently Please let me know if this answers your questions and if I can be of further assistance Thanks Chris Hilgert Enron Compression Services Work Cell wwwenroncomcompression Embedded Microsoft Excel Worksheet

Midwest Energy Hub LLCForwarded by Chris HilgertHOUECT on PM Chris Hilgert AM To Paul NRON Bill NRON Julie A CT Jean nron cc Lisa nron Dayem nron Subject Midwest Energy Hub LLC Folks Latest copy to my knowledge Will touch base with Greg Penman when he gets in Let me know if you have any questions Thanks Chris Forwarded by Chris HilgertHOUECT on AM From Sheila Tweed on AM To Chris ct cc Subject Midwest Energy Hub LLC Attached is the electronic version of the Midewest Energy Hub LLC Agreement Sorry for the delay Ive been having ccomputer problems this morning Please call me if you need anyhting further

MexicaliCan you help me out on this Ill call you Thanks Chris Forwarded by Chris HilgertHOUECT on PM Stephanie NRON AM To Chris ct cc Subject Mexicali Have you been able to locate this information If not is there someone else I can call Thanks Stephanie Forwarded by Stephanie MillerCorpEnron on AM Stephanie Miller AM To Chris ct cc Matthew nron Subject Mexicali Chris As we discussed in todays meeting can you please forward to me and Matt a copy of the ENA pro forma firm sales agreement that we would use for the type of sale discussed below Please let me know if you have any questions Many thanks Stephanie Forwarded by Stephanie MillerCorpEnron on PM Matthew Duffy AM To Stephanie NRON cc Subject Mexicali Stephanie I just want to follow up on the fuel supply discussion we had for FAPSA the paper plant in Mexicali I would like to recover the cost of the gas pipeline which Im including in the capital costs of the plant through a fuel supply agreement that we can mark to market The ideal terms would be for years an Index price plus SoCal transport price plus MMBtu to Enron project company for an amount of approximately MMBtu day I look forward to receiving a draft copy of a standard fuel supply agreement so I can familiarize myself with standard market LD terminology Thanks Matt

Secondary Service Provider Contract Cc We were approached before the holidays by First Union representing Universal Compression to potentially serve as a backup fleet manager for a large portion of their fleet that they are trying to take off balance sheet via First Union should they become insolvent They are trying to do this simultaneously with the close of the merger with Weatherford Mark and I met with the CEO Steve Schneider and CFO Ernie Danner prior to the holidays to discuss this a little further as well as a broader alliance between Enron and Universal to chase electric horsepower deals Universal is comfortable with Enron having somebody like Hanover as a backup to be called upon should Enron be called to fulfill its role and even with a spread so long as Hanover does not see Universal and viceversa Suggested standby fee of yr has been casually thrown out Please review the attached document and lets discuss further perhaps tomorrow morning I talked with Steve Schneider yesterday and he told me that Ernie Danner would be getting with me today regarding a confidentiality agreement regarding this deal as well as a potential marketing alliance which we would like to discuss further with you as well Give me a call when you get a chance and well set something up Thanks Chris You will find attached a copy of an agreement that has been forwarded to us regarding Forwarded by Chris HilgertHOUECT on AM Tim Proffitt PM To Chris ct cc Subject Secondary Service Provider Contract Dont know if I ever sent you this but here is an electronic copy of this Tim Forwarded by Tim ProffittHOUECT on PM Kipp James on AM To cc Subject Secondary Service Provider Contract First Union Securities Inc The attached file is an generic sample of the contractual role the SSP would be asked to fulfill under the ABS structure Give me a call should you have questions James James M Kipp Managing Director Energy Investment Banking Direct Fax email Mgmt Agrmt doc Mgmt Agrmt doc

FW ConfagreeEnron Cc Per my previous email Chris Forwarded by Chris HilgertHOUECT on AM Danner Ernie AM To Chris Hilgert Email cc Snider Steve Carlton Mark Subject FW ConfagreeEnron Attached is our suggested confidentiality agreement to allow us to proceed with discussions Please direct any legal typw comments back to Mark Carlton our atty but Steve or myself can handle any business questions Ernie Original Message From Gilliland Janice Sent Friday December PM To Subject ConfagreeEnron Enroncorpconfidagreedoc Enroncorpconfidagreedoc

Intrastate Pipeline OpportunityWould you please take a look at this and lets discuss Thanks Chris Forwarded by Chris HilgertHOUECT on AM Redinger Andy PM To cc Subject Intrastate Pipeline Opportunity Chris Please find attached the CA for the intrastate pipeline opportunity that we discussed Please execute a copy and fax it back to my attention at The Board meeting went well on Friday and the shareholders have decided to sell all or a part of the intrastate pipeline system As we have discussed this pipeline has direct access to Chicago and Dawn and is the cheapest transportation path into the heavily industrialized areas of northeast Ohio In addition it is the logical source of supply for several gas fired generating facilities being developed in northwestern Ohio With McDonalds assistance the Company is planning to put together an informational memorandum and go to the marketplace in the next two weeks Looking forward to speaking with you further about this opportunity Sincerely Andrew Redinger Senior Vice President Energy Investment Banking Group McDonald Investments Inc Tel Fax ChrisHilgertCAdoc ChrisHilgertCAdoc

RE Power Engineers CAMost of what Kurt has responded with seems somewhat benign Please review and let me know what you think and lets see if we can turn this this week Chris Kurt Bell PM To cc Subject RE Power Engineers CA Chris Thanks for preparing the Confidentiality Agreement In preparation of our discussion on Monday I have already received comments back from our Contracts Department Please find the areas in question highlighted in the attached document The items of concern and suggestions for these areas are as follows Request deletion of this highlighted portion as it confuses the issue Is it that we caused the event that gave rise to the legal action Or just that we disclosed confidential information That is unclear and it is clear in other parts of the agreement that the parties agree not to disclose so this is repetitive The use of the information shall be covered in a project agreement and should not be the subject of this agreement Please request this provision is deleted in its entirety One arbitrator is enough unless the parties agree otherwise Please request language is inserted to mean If the parties agree they need more than a single arbitrator then three shall be chosen We are working towards setting up meetings for April We can discuss this on Monday Kurt Bell Original Message From mailto Sent Friday March AM To Subject Power Engineers CA Kurt Per our discussion you will find attached a CA to cover our forward relationship Please review and let me know your thoughts at your earliest convenience Lets talk on Monday at a minimum Thanks Chris Forwarded by Chris HilgertHOUECT on AM Gerald Nemec To Chris ct cc PM Subject Power Engineers CA Chris Attached is the form of CA for Power Engineers Inc Let me know if you have any qeustions See attached file Power EngineersCADOC Power EngineersCA Power Eng CommentsDOC
AEC Response LetterDRAFTPlease review and let me know your comments so I can send this out tomorrow Thanks Chris

Energen Resources CALewis Energy CAI need a couple of CAs First of all I need a CA for Energen Resources wi th the following information included Energen Resources Corporation st St North Birmingham AL Contact John A Wallace Sr Vice President Methane Topic Enron Compression Services Deal concerning Energens Coal Bed Met hane Operations in the Black Warrior Basin in Alabama Second of all I need a CA for the Lewis Energy Group with the following information included Lewis Energy Group PO Box Encinal TX Contact Rod Lewis CEO Topic Enron Compression Services Deal concerning Lewis Energy Groups G as Gathering and Gas Processing Arrangements in South Texas I will send you the terms and conditions on the Project Chile Agreements tonight Thanks Chris

RE Energen Resources CALewis Energy CAPlease use the following address for Lewis Energy instead Lewis Energy Group Reunion Place Suite San Antonio TX Thanks Chris Original Message From Hilgert Chris Sent Tuesday April PM To Nemec Gerald Subject Energen Resources CALewis Energy CA Gerald I need a couple of CAs First of all I need a CA for Energen Resources wi th the following information included Energen Resources Corporation st St North Birmingham AL Contact John A Wallace Sr Vice President Methane Topic Enron Compression Services Deal concerning Energens Coal Bed Met hane Operations in the Black Warrior Basin in Alabama Second of all I need a CA for the Lewis Energy Group with the following information included Lewis Energy Group PO Box Encinal TX Contact Rod Lewis CEO Topic Enron Compression Services Deal concerning Lewis Energy Groups G as Gathering and Gas Processing Arrangements in South Texas I will send you the terms and conditions on the Project Chile Agreements tonight Thanks Chris

ENAP Agreements Per our recent discussions I am sending you this email to cover the conte nt that we would like to put into a revised letter agreeementwith ENAP As for the CA I would use the following information Mr Salvador Harambour Giner E P General Manager Empresa Nacional Del Petroleo Casilla Correo Las Condes CP Santiago CHILE We need the CA to cover a contemplated structured transaction between Enro n Compression Services and Enron South America Gas Marketing regardinga potential transaction concerningall of their oil gas fieldsin the Magallenes Regionin Southern Chile including any hydrocarbon volumes an d existing sales contracts As for the Engagement Letter I would use a similar format to the previous letter and make sure that it has the following steps outlined The effective date of the engagement will start upon signature ENAP will use best efforts to submit to Enron all of the information that it requires to develop a proposal within days Enron will submit a revised request for data upon execution of this letter agreement Enron will use best efforts to submit an initial proposal within days thereafter and develop definitive agreements with ENAP within days from the date that Enron had received the data from ENAP This should target us to close on a transaction on or around September Please develop these agreements and I will call you later today or tomorrow morning so that we can finalize and get drafts to ENAP to review Thanks Chris

Confidentiality AgreementsTallahassee TripI need a couple of CAs from you First of all the North Coast Transmission LLC CA is finally ready to roll Address North Coast Gas Transmission LLC Westfield Dr Findley OH Subject discussion of potential options to maximize shareholder value with regards to North Coasts Intrastate Transmission Assets Line Line ADB Ashland and Buckeye Lines Second of all I need a CA for JM Huber with the information as follows Address J M Huber Corporation Katy Freeway Suite Houston TX Subject discussion of potential horsepower services and producer outsourcing opportunities around properties in the Texas Panhandle and San Juan Basin Im sure the subject matter language will require some massaging Also are we on for sure next Monday for Tallahasee Let me know Thanks Chris

FW Your EnapEnron Letter Agreement ProposalMessage From Erazo Z Ricardo SIPStgo ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESErazoZECRicardoSIPFStgoCric ardoEerazosipetrolEclE NRONcom Sent Wednesday May PM To Hilgert Chris Cc Reid Dan SIPUSA Harambour Alberto SIPUSA Harambour GSalvador SIPStgo Lee R Patricio O Casa Matriz Rodriguez MFederico SIPStgo Subject Your EnapEnron Letter Agreement Proposal Dear Chris Thanks for your Letter Agreement proposal In general we acept their terms However we suggest little modifications as you can see in the attachment Please if you agree we can executed it and return it to Enron Sincerely yours Ricardo Erazo Domestic EP Contracts Manager Original Message From Reid Dan SIPUSA Sent Lunes de Mayo de To Subject FW Revised Letter AgreementDRAFT ENAP Letter AgreementDRAFT doc Original Message From Hilgert Chris To Alberto Harambour Daniel Reid Sent AM Subject Revised Letter AgreementDRAFT Gentlemen You will find attached a simplified letter agreement between Enron and ENAP regarding the contemplated transaction that outlines a time frame of sixty days to come to a term sheet to transact on We believe that the confidentiality agreement currently in place dated January is sufficient to cover this area as it was written with a defined Area as the Magallanes Area in Southern Chile which includes but is not necessarily limited to geological and geophysical data maps models and interpretations and may also include information relating to the business of ENAP engineering and production data as well as commercial contractual and financial information collectively the Confidential Information At most we may need to amend the CA to identify Enron North America and Enron South America as the counterparties as opposed to Enron Global Exploration Production I apologize for the time it took to get this to you Our attorney has been out and rather swamped and we just closed a big deal on Monday that was burying me for the last week and we have been spending some time with our South American group formulating strategy on this deal Nonetheless we look forward to your response and to getting this process moving to create value for ENAP Please call me after you have had a chance to review this ENAP Letter AgreementDRAFT doc Sincerely Chris Hilgert Director Enron Compression Services ENAP Letter AgreementDRAFT doc ENAP Letter AgreementDRAFT doc
Energen CA RevisionCould we make the minor revision to the attached CA as written and get execution copies put together Let me know if you have any comments Thanks Chris

FW Confidentiality AgreementNonPrivilegedpst Gerald If you are ok with this would you please put together executable copies for us to sign and get to Ormat If not let me know Thanks Chris Hilgert Enron Compression Services Work Cell wwwenroncomcompression Original Message From Hank Leibowitz mailto Sent Tuesday July PM To Hilgert Chris Subject RE Confidentiality Agreement Chris The CA looks okay I made one change in para that requires Enron to identify and mark the confidential information sent to Ormat I presume that not ALL correspondence between us will have to do with structured horsepower transactions See attached Hank Original Message From Hilgert Chris mailtoChris NRONcom Sent Friday July PM To Cc Bennett Peter Subject Confidentiality Agreement Hank You will find attached a confidentiality agreement as discussed for your review We will call you early next week to discuss the potential Transwestern deal further Have a good weekend ConfidOrmatDOC Thanks Chris Hilgert Director Enron Compression Services Work Cell wwwenroncomcompression

RE Confidentiality AgreementNonPrivilegedpst Gerald Further to your voice mail lets put it together as is with the legal language covering oral discussions As for the Energy Transfer Group CA I forgot what I requested as I verbally got it from Mike and then told it to you and did not write it down Let me know if you have the info otherwise Ill call Mike back and discuss Thanks Chris Hilgert Enron Compression Services Work Cell wwwenroncomcompression Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Tuesday July PM To Hilgert Chris Subject RE Confidentiality Agreement Two things The modification excludes all oral information So any confidential information that you guys orally give them is not protected It might be a headache for you guys to remember to mark everything as confidential If you forget it is not protected I think the changes should come out Original Message From Hilgert Chris Sent Tuesday July PM To Nemec Gerald Subject FW Confidentiality Agreement Gerald If you are ok with this would you please put together executable copies for us to sign and get to Ormat If not let me know Thanks Chris Hilgert Enron Compression Services Work Cell wwwenroncomcompression Original Message From Hank Leibowitz mailto Sent Tuesday July PM To Hilgert Chris Subject RE Confidentiality Agreement Chris The CA looks okay I made one change in para that requires Enron to identify and mark the confidential information sent to Ormat I presume that not ALL correspondence between us will have to do with structured horsepower transactions See attached Hank Original Message From Hilgert Chris mailtoChris NRONcom Sent Friday July PM To Cc Bennett Peter Subject Confidentiality Agreement Hank You will find attached a confidentiality agreement as discussed for your review We will call you early next week to discuss the potential Transwestern deal further Have a good weekend ConfidOrmatDOC Thanks Chris Hilgert Director Enron Compression Services Work Cell wwwenroncomcompression

FW Revised Ormat CANonPrivilegedpst Ill call you later today about this Im travelling to West Texas for the day Chris Original Message From Hank Leibowitz Sent Thu PM To Hilgert Chris Cc Subject RE Revised Ormat CA Chris Sorry I missed your call Enrons need for protection of classified information furnished verbally is accepted However such information needs to be identified Changed CA accordingly Hank Original Message From Hilgert Chris mailtoChris NRONcom Sent Thursday July AM To Subject Revised Ormat CA Hank Made a couple of minor changes to the CA that incorporated yours Please review and we will get you execution copies Enron ConfidOrmatADOC Thanks Chris Hilgert Enron Compression Services Work Cell wwwenroncomcompression

RE Final Keystone Term Sheet Cc NonPrivilegedpst Looks good to me Send it out as soon as the CA is signed Thanks Chris Hilgert Enron Compression Services Work Cell wwwenroncomcompression Original Message From Druzbik Lisa Sent Monday July PM To Higgins Ned Hilgert Chris Bieniawski Paul Vasquez Miguel Gregory Paul Wilson Garry D Cc Nemec Gerald Subject Final Keystone Term Sheet Importance High Team Attached is the final Keystone Term Sheet proposal to Northern Natural Gas NNG is still in the process of having the CA signed As soon as the CA is signed by NNG Tuesday at the earliest the attached Term Sheet will be delivered to NNG by Ned Higgins File NNG Keystone Term Sheet July IIdoc Thanks Lisa Druzbik

RE Amended Compression Service Agreement Cc NonPrivilegedpst Jean Mrha has been out the last couple of days and will be back in on Monday We will have the documents signed for you then I apologize for the delay Thanks Chris Hilgert Enron Compression Services Work Cell wwwenroncomcompression Original Message From Holtzman Staci Sent Friday August PM To Hilgert Chris Nemec Gerald Cc Kilmer III Robert Subject Amended Compression Service Agreement Importance High Chris we would very much like to get the Amended and Restated Compression Services Agreement executed as these changes were agreed to several months ago and the project is moving forward Could you let me know when we can expect to get this agreement returned Thanks

FW Construction Expedition Letter Cc Gerald Im ok with the draft except I would like to see some language for tracking costs at least on an aggregate basis so we can assess the risk as the project develops I believe that our risk is near zero if the project is going to come in for less than MM overall I would hope that Gulf Power is appropriately incentivized to manage their way towards a less than MM number as they may ultimately lose it back to the commission in lower rates Push this and any other comments back to Jeff and lets get this closed up for signature tomorrow morning Thanks Chris Hilgert Enron Compression Services Work Cell wwwenroncomcompression Original Message From Jeffrey Stone mailto Sent Tuesday November PM To Hilgert Chris Nemec Gerald Cc Russell Badders Subject Construction Expedition Letter Here is my attempt at modifying the letter to conform to our discussions this afternoon The redline markings indicate changes to a clean version of the draft sent yesterday This draft incorporates a slightly modified version of the confidentiality statement you provided earlier today changed Parties to Party etc Please acknowledge receipt

Oakhill LOIGerald As discussed insert the confidentiality language and print out on letterhead and initial We will be getting Jeans signature in the morning Please note the sentence add for financing extension negotiations in Section ab and see if you concur Thanks Chris Hilgert Enron Compression Services Work Cell wwwenroncomcompression

FW Confidentiality AgreementGerald Another thing for us to discuss tomorrow Thanks Chris Hilgert Enron Compression Services Work Cell wwwenroncomcompression Original Message From mailto Sent Monday November AM To Hilgert Chris Subject Confidentiality Agreement Hi Chris Per our meeting this morning find attached the Confidentiality Agreement If acceptable please sign and fax back to me Once this agreement is signed I will email you the following Letter of intend Between Whale and its Venezuelan Partners Tecser Ingenieria Ehcopek SA Translated copy of the PDVSA contract Venezuelan WET JV Agreement in negotiation between Whale Tecser Ehcopek A copy of the JV between Universal Whale regarding the Colombian project A model that we can use between us If you have any question feel free to call me Best regards Roland Herro Whale Manufacturing Procurement Inc Mangum suite Houston TX Tel Fax Cell
Draft LOIJohn Per our discussion you will find the Draft LOI attached I will call you shortly regarding your questions Thanks Chris Hilgert Enron Compression Services Work Cell wwwenroncomcompression

FW Pumping Station PowerLets discuss Chris Hilgert Enron Compression Services Work Cell wwwenroncomcompression Original Message From Howell Marion W mailto Sent Wednesday November PM To Hilgert Chris Cc Owen David Sims Ken C Badders Russell A Stone Jeff A Subject Pumping Station Power Chris This will confirm our discussions of today regarding accelerating completion of electric power to the pumping station It is Enron Compression Services ECS desire to accelerate the completion of the project from the currently projected early May completion date to March ECS will agree to pay the acceleration cost Our current most probable estimate of this cost is but it could run as much as or higher ECS would like a guaranteed cap of Gulf estimates that the acceleration activities discussed with you will provide a confidence level of greater than that we can meet the March date Both of us agree that we cannot give any guaranteed date because of the inherent uncertainties Our budget for the line construction contractor cost is including accounting and other standard overheads ECS would pay any amount over that Additionally ECS would pay for accelerating the structure design and Hinsons Crossroads Substation activities ECS would also pay approximately to accelerate acquisition of Right of Way We have faxed letters between Gulf and attorneys for three property owners which shows the difference between the parties ECS would like some assurances that cost is reasonably minimized within the constraints of meeting the desired schedule The details and specifics of the above would be formalized in an agreement to be signed between the parties Both parties acknowledge that time is of the essence in completing the execution of a suitable agreement lest the start of acceleration of the project be delayed to the point that we would not be able to meet the March date We also discussed the merits of developing a Memorandum of Intent for the parties to quickly execute so that some of the acceleration activities can begin as the agreement is finalized This agreement must be completed within the next few days ECS also raised the prospect of two agreements one to cover the Right of Way and another to address the line construction We will be faxing to you tomorrow a Gantt chart of a proposed acceleration schedule Regarding the cost breakdown of the line construction cost the following is a typical cost by activities Structure Framing and Setting Anchors and Guys Conductors and Static Wires Grounding Miscellaneous TOTAL This should complete the information you requested Please call me if you need more at this time We will provide you a draft of the Memorandum as soon as possible

RE ROW DocumentGerald Looks good to me In the signature block should it be Enron Compression Services Company as opposed to Enron Compression Company The information that I have on the ROW tracts is not specifically descriptive other than to describe them as tracts owned by Herbert and Margaret Lane Property Alan and Elizabeth English Property and Kay Arnold Fritz Property all in dispute along the Shaky Joe Swamp Transmission Line The attorney representing these people is Brigham Moore LLP and the representing attorney appears to be Andrew Prince Brigham Hopefully this is good enough If you need to talk to me call me at or leave me a voice mail at When you have a draft of the Construction Cost Overage letter please send it to me Thanks again for all your help and hard work Thanks Chris Hilgert Enron Compression Services Work Cell wwwenroncomcompression Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Monday November PM To Hilgert Chris Owen David Subject ROW Document Chris Attached is the document to which Russell and I have agreed Next step is for us to get signed and fax to Russell Do you have the tract descriptions that Gulf forwarded Does Dave File GulfExpediteLetterROWdoc

RE Construction Expedition LetterGerald Three basic comments as the cap Best efforts not reasonable efforts Better integration of ECSFGT into the construction process not just reports When you get in lets discuss Thanks Chris Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Mon PM To Cc Hilgert Chris Subject FW Construction Expedition Letter Per our discussion please review and provide comments asap Original Message From Jeffrey Stone ENRON Sent Monday November PM To Nemec Gerald Cc Hilgert Chris Subject Construction Expedition Letter Here are Gulfs proposed changes to match the concept discussed earlier this afternoon Original Message From Nemec Gerald SMTPGerald NRONcom Sent Wednesday November AM To Howell Marion W Cc Hilgert Chris Owen David Alexander James C Subject Construction Expedition Letter For your review is the draft Construction Expedition Letter per our discussions Monday GulfExpediteLetterdoc This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you File GulfExpediteLetterdoc GulfExpediteLetterdoc GulfExpediteLetterdoc

entries did get made correct Let me know Chris Hilgert Enron Compression Services Work Cell wwwenroncomcompression Original Message From Gruesen Karen Sent Thursday October PM To Hilgert Chris Cc Whiting Greg Cruz Jorge Subject FW Notice Letter for ECC Chris Wanted to let you know that the investment in KachineGallup is not This will reduce the net gain to Please let me know if you have any questions Thanks Karen Original Message From Hilgert Chris Sent Friday September AM To Gruesen Karen Subject FW Notice Letter for ECC Karen Per our discussion you will find attached the letter that Jean is going to sign According to the numbers showed to me by Carol earlier this week we should expect to book a gain of as a result of doing this calculations below Please review and let me know if Enron Compression Services ProposalNonPrivilegedpst Andy Per our recent discussions you will find a proposal from Enron Compression Services to provide HP Services to KNG Energy to meet it growth expectations either as is or through a new joint ventureownership structure from the current bidding process We have made this proposal to conform with the expansion scenarios outlined in the offering memorandum and have provided flexibility for a load factor to be utilized for both stations We would be happy to have a teleconference to go through this proposal with you You will also note that the latter part of the presentation begins to outline additional options on a notional value basis that we can put into a deal to increase the value of the deal over the proposed year term We took a look at the strategic value of the underlying assets that were offered and were unfortunately not able to come up with a structure that we could support for either the purchase or recapitalization of KNG Energys assets We appreciate the opportunity to bid on these assets and are happy to work with you to optimize our proposal to fit the ultimate owners needs for expansion I have also attached our groups brochure and a copy of a recent article about our group in Gas Daily Once again thank you for the opportunity and I will call you in the near future to discuss this proposal further Chris Hilgert Director Enron Compression Services The parties hereto understand and agree that the PROPOSAL sets forth each partys preliminary understanding of the proposed transactions with KNG EnerGY and Enron compression services This PROPOSAL does not create and is not intended to create a binding and enforceable contract between the parties or a duty on the part of any party hereto to negotiate in good faith toward a binding contract and may not be relied upon by either party as the basis for a contract by estoppel or otherwise but rather this proposal evidences a nonbinding expression of the understanding of each party to endeavor without obligation to negotiate the terms of a proposed transaction

Original Message From Hilgert Chris To Alberto Harambour Daniel Reid Sent AM Subject Revised Letter AgreementDRAFT Gentlemen You will find attached a simplified letter agreement between Enron and ENAP regarding the contemplated transaction that outlines a time frame of sixty days to come to a term sheet to transact on We believe that the confidentiality agreement currently in place dated January is sufficient to cover this area as it was written with a defined Area as the Magallanes Area in Southern Chile which includes but is not necessarily limited to geological and geophysical data maps models and interpretations and may also include information relating to the business of ENAP engineering and production data as well as commercial contractual and financial information collectively the Confidential Information At most we may need to amend the CA to identify Enron North America and Enron South America as the counterparties as opposed to Enron Global Exploration Production I apologize for the time it took to get this to you Our attorney has been out and rather swamped and we just closed a big deal on Monday that was burying me for the last week and we have been spending some time with our South American group formulating strategy on this deal Nonetheless we look forward to your response and to getting this process moving to create value for ENAP Please call me after you have had a chance to review this ENAP Letter AgreementDRAFT doc Sincerely Chris Hilgert Director Enron Compression Services ENAP Letter AgreementDRAFT doc ENAP Letter AgreementDRAFT doc

ENAP Agreements Per our recent discussions I am sending you this email to cover the conte nt that we would like to put into a revised letter agreeementwith ENAP As for the CA I would use the following information Mr Salvador Harambour Giner E P General Manager Empresa Nacional Del Petroleo Casilla Correo Las Condes CP Santiago CHILE We need the CA to cover a contemplated structured transaction between Enro n Compression Services and Enron South America Gas Marketing regardinga potential transaction concerningall of their oil gas fieldsin the Magallenes Regionin Southern Chile including any hydrocarbon volumes an d existing sales contracts As for the Engagement Letter I would use a similar format to the previous letter and make sure that it has the following steps outlined The effective date of the engagement will start upon signature ENAP will use best efforts to submit to Enron all of the information that it requires to develop a proposal within days Enron will submit a revised request for data upon execution of this letter agreement Enron will use best efforts to submit an initial proposal within days thereafter and develop definitive agreements with ENAP within days from the date that Enron had received the data from ENAP This should target us to close on a transaction on or around September Please develop these agreements and I will call you later today or tomorrow morning so that we can finalize and get drafts to ENAP to review Thanks Chris

Secondary Service Provider Contract Cc We were approached before the holidays by First Union representing Universal Compression to potentially serve as a backup fleet manager for a large portion of their fleet that they are trying to take off balance sheet via First Union should they become insolvent They are trying to do this simultaneously with the close of the merger with Weatherford Mark and I met with the CEO Steve Schneider and CFO Ernie Danner prior to the holidays to discuss this a little further as well as a broader alliance between Enron and Universal to chase electric horsepower deals Universal is comfortable with Enron having somebody like Hanover as a backup to be called upon should Enron be called to fulfill its role and even with a spread so long as Hanover does not see Universal and viceversa Suggested standby fee of yr has been casually thrown out Please review the attached document and lets discuss further perhaps tomorrow morning I talked with Steve Schneider yesterday and he told me that Ernie Danner would be getting with me today regarding a confidentiality agreement regarding this deal as well as a potential marketing alliance which we would like to discuss further with you as well Give me a call when you get a chance and well set something up Thanks Chris You will find attached a copy of an agreement that has been forwarded to us regarding Forwarded by Chris HilgertHOUECT on AM Tim Proffitt PM To Chris ct cc Subject Secondary Service Provider Contract Dont know if I ever sent you this but here is an electronic copy of this Tim Forwarded by Tim ProffittHOUECT on PM Kipp James on AM To cc Subject Secondary Service Provider Contract First Union Securities Inc The attached file is an generic sample of the contractual role the SSP would be asked to fulfill under the ABS structure Give me a call should you have questions James James M Kipp Managing Director Energy Investment Banking Direct Fax email Mgmt Agrmt doc Mgmt Agrmt doc
